name: botfoods-desktop
description: Aplicativo desktop para gest√£o de estabelecimentos de alimentos

scripts.build:electron: cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --config electron-builder.json
scripts.build:electron:win: cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --win --config electron-builder.json
scripts.build:electron:portable: cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --win --config electron-builder.json --x64 --ia32
scripts.build:installer-only: cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --win --config electron-builder.json
scripts.build:unified-installer: npm run build:service && npm run build:installer-only
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push origin develop && git push origin --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push origin develop && git push origin --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push origin develop && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && git checkout main && git merge develop && git push origin main
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && git checkout main && git merge develop && git push origin main
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && git checkout main && git merge develop && git push origin main
scripts.release:prepare: cross-env NODE_ENV=production VITE_API_URL=https://botfoods-api-prod-388663121982.southamerica-east1.run.app/api/login vite build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --win --publish=never
